Text:
i am having trouble with the DTS 5.1 audio during playback through my yamaha receiver... it skips out all of a sudden (and then comes back to normal). Not experienced with any other download yet which have DTS 5.1 sound. 
Hope this helps others.

please disregard my previous comment.
problem was on my side. audio is fine.
i actually just demuxed and remuxed just the video and audio streams and it seems to work flawlessly with my receiver... no cut outs.
also, works fine on the computer.
Thank you so much! So many horrible torrents of this movie out there, but this is just perfect. Thanks.
